svg.title: DP-06: Intelligent Resource Allocation & Optimization Engine
svg.desc: Advanced resource optimization system that dynamically allocates team members, skills, and time across projects while maximizing productivity and maintaining work-life balance through intelligent analysis and automated workload balancing.
